message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire something that will bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to start with a price of $12000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I have to consider the value I've put into this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $11000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10500. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable with the price you're offering. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing money on this deal. I'm counteroffering at $11500. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product brings to your business.

I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to be careful with my budget. I'm willing to go up to $11000. I hope we can find a compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob, but I'm still not getting the price I need to make this deal worthwhile. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to think about the minimum price I can accept. I'm counteroffering at $12500. I think this is the lowest price I can accept and still make a profit.

I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I really need to be careful with my budget. I'm willing to go up to $11250. I hope we can find a compromise.

I've made it clear that I'm not willing to go below $12500, Bob. I'm starting to think that we're not going to meet in the middle on this one. I'm willing to make one last offer, but I need to think about my next steps. I'm counteroffering at $13000. This is my final offer, and I expect you to consider it carefully.
